title: Create demo video for Product Hunt
description: Record a 30-90 second demo video showing: signing in with GitHub, selecting a repo, navigating between views, creating a task, and viewing timeline. No sound needed, use screen recording with smooth transitions.

acceptance_criteria.description: Script the key flow: login → select repo → show timeline → show board → create task
Record screen at 1920x1080 with clean browser chrome
Edit video with smooth transitions (keep under 90 seconds)
Export as MP4 and upload to hosting (YouTube/Vimeo)
